title: Greek salad
ingredients: ['5 large tomatoes', '1 small red onion, thinly sliced', 'sea salt to taste', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried Greek oregano', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', 'Optional', '100g feta cheese, crumbled', '1/2 cucumber, sliced', '1 small green pepper, sliced', '1 handful Greek olives']
